publicationStmt.publisher: By G. Eld for T[homas] T[horpe] and are to be solde by Iohn Wright, dwelling at Christ Church gate,

notesStmt.note: A title-page variant of the edition with imprint giving William Aspley as bookseller.
Contains a frontispiece port. of Shakespeare, from another item, and pasted in, signed: Martin Droeshout sculpsit London. -- Cf. Folger Lib. catalog.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
